name: Wut Dis?
description:
Wut is Wut Dis? No one knows.

Don't expect an app that makes a lot of sense.

What you can expect: a fun app that makes you kick back with your friends and guess wat is the random super zoomed-in thing you're looking at.

Play it with your friends. At a party. At your baht mitzvah. Really anywhere you can lug around your Apple TV.
